definitions.definition: A subgenre of science fiction that depicts advanced technology combined with Victorian style and aesthetics, such as steam-powered machines and vehicles, visible gears and screws and people dressed in 19th-century attires.
A person cosplaying as a steampunk character.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A subgenre of science fiction that depicts advanced technology combined with Victorian style and aesthetics, such as steam-powered machines and vehicles, visible gears and screws and people dressed in 19th-century attires.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A writer of steampunk fiction .
( countable , cosplay ) A person cosplaying as a steampunk character.
